content.rendered:
Prev India

ABOUT

Every woman has the right to judgement free access to safe and effective contraception and gynaecology care. 

At Prev, their mission is to make this right a reality for women across India. They empower women to take control of their sexual and reproductive health in an accessible, affordable and judgement free way.

SCOPE

  • Web UI/UX
  • Illustration
  • Brand Communication

INDUSTRY

Sexual Health and Wellness

CHALLENGES

Gaining
Sexual Freedom

01

Understanding the stigma attached to sexual wellness
in India.
Understanding the stigma attached to sexual wellness in India.

02

Providing safe, judgement free services to women in need.

03

Designing a personalised quiz to suggest the right contraceptive for you.

04

Meeting speculated timelines for UI/UX and development.

SOLUTION

Design Solutions
Made Simple

Brandemic tackled most of these Prev challenges adeptly by undertaking many different responsibilities. Some of them included overcoming the stigma around sexual wellness in India through sensitive design, providing a judgment-free platform for women, crafting a personalized quiz for contraceptive suggestions, and meeting tight UI/UX development timelines with precision.

Sexual Wellness, Unlocked

IDENTITY

A seamless web experience to position Prev India as the Market leaders they are in the Sexual Wellness space.

ILLUSTRATION

Playful and vibrant illustrations were designed for the website to make it light-hearted and fun.

IMPACT

The Differences
We Make

With the entire UI/UX exercise, we were successfully able to position the product as an accessible, judgement free product, and the market received the design really well. We saw early adoption of the product. We were able to generate sales for the products almost immediately though the brand was super new.
